original_text: Philip answered, ‘A man could work for eight months to get 200 silver coins. But he still would not have enough money to buy bread for all these people. There would not be enough bread for each person here to have even a little piece.’
korean_text: 빌립이 대답하되 각 사람으로 조금씩 받게 할지라도 이백 데나리온의 떡이 부족하리이다

sentences.original_text: A man could work for eight months
sentences.korean_translation: 한 사람이 여덟 달 동안 일할 수 있지만

sentences.original_text: But he still would not have enough money
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그는 여전히 충분한 돈이 없을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: to buy bread for all these people.
sentences.korean_translation: 이 모든 사람을 위해 빵을 사기에

sentences.original_text: There would not be enough bread
for each person here to have
sentences.korean_translation: 여기 있는 각 사람이 가질 수 있도록
